statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (2,-10) and (12,4).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{4}-{\left(-{10}\right)}}}{{{12}-{\left({2}\right)}}}=\frac{{14}}{{10}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{7}}{{5}} (if it's not already reduced)
